articles.title: 🎉💃 November 3-week Beginner Dance Courses! 💃🎉
articles.author: Alyssa
articles.short: November marks your last chance to join our electrifying dance classes for the year before we take a short break. We'll be back on January 9th and 10th to kick off the new year with a bang!
articles.text:
November marks your last chance to join our electrifying dance classes for the year before we take a short break. We'll be back on January 9th and 10th to kick off the new year with a bang! 

 Why Choose Us?
🕺 Dance Your Way to Fitness: Are you looking to stay active and fit while having a blast? Look no further! Our Latin dance classes combine fitness and fun like no other. You'll be burning calories and breaking a sweat while grooving to infectious rhythms.
🎉 Learn from the Best: Our passionate and experienced instructors will guide you through every step, making sure you feel confident on the dance floor in no time. Whether you're a complete beginner or have some dance experience, we've got you covered.
📅 Last Chance for 2023: Don't miss out on this exclusive opportunity to join our classes this year. November is your final chance! After a short break, we'll be back on January 9th and 10th, so mark your calendars.Class Schedule:
🕗 November Schedule:
* Salsa Beginners dates: 31st October, 7th November, 14th November
* Bachata Beginners dates: 1st November, 8th November, 15th November
🗓️ Save the Date:
* We'll be on break from 16th November to January 8th.
* Classes resume on 9th and 10th January, 2024.
Why Latin Dance?Discover the magic of Latin dance, where every step is an adventure and every move is a work of art. Whether you're looking to impress on the dance floor or simply want to unwind and enjoy the rhythm of life, our classes have something for everyone.
Join Us Today!Don't let this opportunity slip away! Reserve your spot now and be part of our exciting Latin dance community. Limited spots available for November, so secure your place today. Get ready to dance, stay fit, and have the time of your life!
Contact Us:
Got questions? Need more information? Feel free to reach out to us. We're here to help you embark on your dance journey!

latin_shine@outlook.com

articles.title: 🎉💃 NEW October Beginner Dance Courses: Unleash Your Inner Rhythm with Latin Shine Dance Company! 💃🎉
articles.author: Alyssa
articles.short: Exciting news, dance enthusiasts! High Wycombe's favorite Latin dance hub, Latin Shine Dance Company, is kickstarting a fresh and vibrant batch of Bachata and Salsa classes this October.
articles.text:
Exciting news, dance enthusiasts! High Wycombe's favorite Latin dance hub, Latin Shine Dance Company, is kickstarting a fresh and vibrant batch of Bachata and Salsa classes this October. 🌟 Take your first step into the world of Latin dance with Latin Shine Dance Company 🌟

📅 When?
Mark your calendars – our fiery dance sessions ignite on the 3rd and 4th of October.

👟 Who's it for?
Everyone! Beginners, don/'t be shy. This course is tailored to make you fall in love with the beats of Bachata and Salsa. And guess what? No dance partner? No worries! You don’t need one to join in on the fun.

📍 Where?In the heart of High Wycombe. Dive into an environment that's fun, friendly, and full of energy! Check location details for our Guildhall & Castle Street Dance Studio

💡 Tip: Our classes tend to fill up fast, especially with the buzz of a new course. Secure your spot now and immerse yourself in the world of Latin dance.

Ready to dance, laugh, and shine? Join Latin Shine Dance Company this October. Because life's better when you dance! 💃🕺

articles.title: Back to School - our new September courses info!
articles.author: Alyssa
articles.short: With summer breaks over, we are announcing our September beginners courses date. Join Alyssa and Martin on the 5th and 6th of September for our new Salsa and Bachata courses.
articles.text:
With summer breaks over, we are announcing our September beginners courses date. Join Alyssa and Martin on the 5th and 6th of September for our new Salsa and Bachata courses. We are looking forward to seeing you all there! 💆💆‍♀️ Partners are not required! Beginners are welcome!
Price: £10 per person
(£7 for student with the valid NUS/University card).
Time:
7pm - Beginners 
8pm - Improvers. Start your early Autumn dancing journey with us.

articles.title: 💃🕺 October Bachata Classes!
articles.author: Martin
articles.short: 💃🕺Interested in trying something new in October? 💃🕺 Come learn Sensual Bachata which includes basic steps, dancing technique and shines and body movement in High Wycombe!
articles.text: 💃🕺Interested in trying something new in October? 💃🕺 Come learn Sensual Bachata which includes basic steps, dancing technique and shines and body movement in High Wycombe! Our new complete beginner`s course starts this Wednesday! (4 Week course) 🕖 Time:7PM (beginners) 📆 Date: 5th of October, 2022 (every Wednesday) 📣Price: £10 or £7 for students 🔹 Venue: Guildhall (1st floor), HighStreet, High Wycombe ▶️ Details: https://fb.me/e/208mrMMqg No partner or prior dancing experience is necessary. Our Latin Shine community is growing every week ❤️ Come meet new people and have fun learning something new!

articles.title: 💃🕺 BACHATA CLASSES IN HIGH WYCOMBE - EVERY WEDNESDAY!
articles.author: Martin
articles.short: We are teaching Bachata Sensual classes at the High Wycombe Guildhall (High Street).
articles.text: We are teaching Bachata Sensual classes at the High Wycombe Guildhall (High Street). Classes are taught by two of our instructors Alyssa and Martin to represent Sensual Style dynamics of followers and leaders.
